name: Volume Suprême Plumping Lip Gloss
about: What it is:A visibly volumizing lip gloss infused with hyaluronic acid and Labrador tea..Formulation Type:Lip Gloss.Benefits:Hydrating, Long-wearing.Highlighted Ingredients:- Hyaluronic Acid: Visibly volumizes lips and reduces fine lines and wrinkles..Ingredient Callouts:Free of parabens. It is also vegan and cruelty-free..What Else You Need to Know:Enriched with powerful, visibly volumizing, and hydrating ingredients, this smooth, nonsticky gloss glides on effortlessly, adding shine and exceptional color to your lips. The gentle and comfortable tingling sensation upon application leaves lips looking revitalized and plumped..Clinical Results:In a consumer test on 40 participants:
ingredients: -Hyaluronic Acid: Visibly volumizes lips and reduces fine lines and wrinkles..-Labrador Tea: Is a Canadian antioxidant that protects lips from environmental aggressors..-Jojoba and Oat Oils: Provide remarkable hydration...Polybutene, Octyldodecanol, Silica Dimethyl Silylate, Ethylhexyl Palmitate, Triacontanyl PVP, Mica, Lactobacillus Ferment, Avena Sativa (Oat) Kernel Extract, Lactobacillus Ferment Lysate, Ledum Groenlandicum Extract, Sodium Hyaluronate, Amorphophallus Konjac Root Powder, Tocopheryl Acetate, Simmondsia Chinensis (Jojoba) Seed Oil, Tocopherol, Calcium Aluminum Borosilicate, Maltodextrin, Menthoxypropanediol, Glycine Soja (Soybean) Oil, Vanillyl Butyl Ether, Synthetic Fluorphlogopite, Glycerin, Silica, Trihydroxystearin, Sorbitan Oleate, Tin Oxide, Parfum (Fragrance), Limonene. +/- CI 77891 (Titanium Dioxide), CI 77742 (Manganese Violet), CI 15850 (Red 7 Lake), CI 45410 (Red 28 Lake), CI 19140 (Yellow 5 Lake), CI 17200 (Red 33 Lake), CI 77491, CI 77492 (Iron Oxides).
how_to_use: Suggested Usage:.-Apply as often as needed. .-Apply Waterproof Lip Crayon or Virtual Lip Contour (each sold separately) before applying your favorite shade of Volume Suprême Plumping Lip Gloss.
